name: utxopocket
description: UTXO Pocket is a watch-only Bitcoin wallet built with Vue 3 and TypeScript, enabling users to manage and visualize UTXOs efficiently. It features a NestJS backend integrated with Bitcoiner Lab, Redis, and bitcoinjs-lib for advanced Bitcoin operations. The wallet supports secure Electrum protocol connections to local or remote nodes, ensuring a reliable and efficient experience for users.
author: strhodler
